org.treetank.api

Interface INode

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    INameNode, INode, IStructNode, IValNode
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AtomicValue, AttributeNode, DocumentRootNode, DumbNodeFactory.DumbNode, ElementNode, NameNodeDelegate, NamespaceNode, NodeDelegate, NodePage.DeletedNode, StructNodeDelegate, TextNode, ValNodeDelegate

    public interface INode
    Overall INode-Interface for the interaction with the page-layer. All persistence functionality must be handled over this interface while all node-layers interfaces interhit from this interface.
    Author:
    Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] getByteRepresentation()
      Getting the byte representation of the INode.
      long getHash()
      Getting the persistent stored hash.
      long getNodeKey()
      Gets unique INode key.

      Setting the actual hash of the structure.
